One of my favorite games of all time, only takes about 2 hours to finish the first time you play it, very enjoyable experience. 10/10

The game may be old, but it's still gold! It features many interesting puzzles; to be solved using the [i]Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device[/i]. The game also contains many compelling [spoiler]secrets[/spoiler].

The game is not frustratingly hard; solving it yourselves would grant a sense of pride and accomplishment.
A definite recommend if you're willing to spare some[spoiler]time in about an afternoon[/spoiler]
Great classical and has a nostalgic feeling to it

I heard a lot about this game, and the game came out a long time ago, so I decided to go through it, the game is pretty short, but the time spent in the portal is worth it, the developers did their best to lure the player and show him the atmosphere of the game. Actually the game was released in 2007 and looks very beautiful, I really like the mechanics of the game, the portals are pretty interesting in the game, and the song voiced by the girl in the game finale is cool. Shorter than 10/10 puzzles.
Una vez que lo juegas es muy adictivo
Really love the puzzle/story setup of this game. A fun time-pass.

It's a fair game, but nothing incredible as what everyone else seems to suggest. There is nothing that makes it so extraordinary or mindblowing or fun. Maybe concept of the portals is interesting, but that's really all that's so intriguing with this game. 

The story is not developed not absorbing; and that's kind of all there is with this game... innovative puzzles and a kind of boring story--at least compared to other games.
Interesting psychological moments with the story tho. Just not as fantastic as everyone makes it seem

I knew about the fame of this game for a LOOONG time, but I've never given myself the chance to get to it. I was expecting a puzzle game.. Today I finally played it and BOY OH BOY it was WAY MORE than just a puzzle game!.

Do yourself a favor, stop reading this, go and experience it yourself!.

Epic game with an unexpected story. Would totally recommend to others.
Could be longer, but overall there should be more games like this.
Un juego excepcional y perfecto. Mis 10!

I love this game!

Everything is done so well, the writing and comedy are great, the game-play and portal gun mechanic is so fun and innovative. I can't believe it took me this long to try out this game. I'll be playing 2 right away.

Only flaw is that their could have been more content!
Fantastic game. Despite its age its still plenty fun...However, don't buy it at full price better off just waiting till a steam sale where the price should be around 1$.

This is an amazing game, tying in comedy and drama to make a compelling Sci - fi based adventure. The only thing I can think of for a negative, would be that it felt pretty short, the the puzzles were simple to complete.
I haven't ever played any of valves "classic" games before this is an amazing game and i'm glad I picked it up.

This game puts everything you thought you knew about the laws of physics, and throws it away. 15 out of 5 stars.
The game is short but, also very fun and is never a chore to play!
Really creative puzzles. They weren't too hard and fun to solve. In general is a great classic game, which seems to be timeless.
great game like portal 2 only problem is that its a bit short but still fun to play like its sequel

AMAZING concept, GREAT gameplay, WAAAAY too short story mode. I finished the game thinking I had just finished the tutorial. Would have been mad had it not been at like 80% discout price. Totally worth for the price I paid.
